name: Gatixo 4.0
description:
Lixonildo, the king of the garbage monsters, has stolen the goldfish from the Cat Kingdom, and it's up to brothers Lyra and Leo to save the day! Defeat monsters made of garbage and clear the road in order to retrieve the goldfish and bring balance to the world!


Board game I made for a course in game design. If you like it or want to give feedback please write a comment!
